trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger is eager to rejoin Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Y'shtola at the Drowning Brand.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_TODO_01<tab>Survey the area.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Zero.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_000<tab>Y'shtola, was it?
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_YSHTOLA_000_005<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We can begin as soon as the others arrive.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_ESTINIEN_000_010<tab>Some manner of cactuar attempted to make mischief, but no one came to harm. How did you fare?
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_NIDHANA_000_015<tab>With Estinien keeping us safe, we were able to finish repairing the brands without incident!
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_WATCHEROFMOON_000_017<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What aid I lend in restoring the brands is insignificant next to that which you and yours must accomplish.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_WATCHEROFMOON_000_018<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>When my part is complete, I shall stand apart and observe, as I have ever done. For it was to you that Venat has entrusted the future.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_URIANGER_000_020<tab>The brands are ready, I presume? Excellent. With the Loporrits having deployed their supporters, we are ready to proceed.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_URIANGER_000_021<tab>Let us rejoin Y'shtola posthaste, and prise open our gate unto the void.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_030<tab>This is it...
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_URIANGER_000_035<tab>I have duly informed Y'shtola of our task's completion.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_URIANGER_000_036<tab>While you all tend to matters in the Thirteenth, I shall remain here and ensure the integrity of gate and seal both.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_YSHTOLA_000_040<tab>My thanks for seeing to the supporters. With this, all is in readiness for the ritual.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_YSHTOLA_000_041<tab>First, I shall give the order to Alphinaud and Alisaie in the Tower of Babil to channel aether to the moon.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_YSHTOLA_000_042<tab>Once we have amassed a sufficient amount of energy, Urianger and I shall begin our incantations to open a voidgate.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_YSHTOLA_000_043<tab>If all goes well, a tear will form in the fabric of reality, at which point you must activate the brands and put in place the containment seal.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_YSHTOLA_000_044<tab>That is all. If there are no questions, then let us begin!
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_050<tab>...
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Zero appears to be lost in thought, her gaze fixed upon the fathomless abyss...
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_ESTINIEN_000_055<tab>My lance will be ready should any more of Golbez's pawns appear.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_YSHTOLA_000_060<tab>No sign of a watcher or any Loporrits. Perhaps they were swallowed up in the Flood of Darkness...or perhaps they never existed here.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>The surface of the moon is a grim shade of crimson. A consequence of the Flood of Darkness perhaps.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>No matter how you strain your eyes, you spy no signs of life. In all directions extends a desolate waste without end.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>You hold your breath in an attempt to catch the faintest noise. Save for the sounds of your comrades, there is nothing.
TEXT_AKTKMK107_04741_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>So far, you have failed to find any clues as to Azdaja's whereabouts. Perhaps Zero has noticed something you missed...
